title: Bill Kristol might regret his Twitter poll pitting Mitt Romney against Donald Trump
text:
As you’ve heard, President Donald Trump fired back after Sen. Mitt Romney posted a couple of critical tweets suggesting that there could be no other motivation for Trump to ask for assistance looking into the Bidens and Ukraine and China than political, calling it “wrong and appalling.”

“If Mitt worked this hard on Obama, he could have won,” Trump replied Saturday.

There’s a lot of chatter on Twitter about who’s right — Romney or Trump — but Never Trumper Bill Kristol decided to start a poll asking who was more respected: Trump or Romney. Kristol called Twitter a hellscape, meaning we’re pretty sure he knew which way his poll would go, and after just six hours and more than 133,662 votes, Trump is way out ahead.

Let’s see how much of a hellscape Twitter is. Whom do you respect more? — Bill Kristol (@BillKristol) October 5, 2019

Here’s what it looks like now, but maybe Romney will have all of his children and grandchildren vote and tip the scale.

Just because liberals flock to you like flies to rotting food doesn't mean they outnumber average working Americans. — Pooka Luck (@MuchLuck) October 5, 2019

If you’d come out of your elitist Trump-hating bubble, Bill, and look around you, maybe follow some real non-blue checked people, you’d get a clue. You have no idea what’s going on in the real world. — 🇺🇸😎MAMADOXIE🤬🇺🇸 (@Mamadoxie) October 5, 2019

Sucks to be you, loser. — Kevin Barry Maguire (@Drathzaar) October 5, 2019

I see Kristol has finally found a way to get retweets: post polls in which he is abjectly humiliated. — BattleSwarm (@BattleSwarmBlog) October 5, 2019

Whom do you respect more? — Uri Blago (@UriBlago) October 5, 2019

I wouldn’t delight in your demise so much but you get crushed ONLY when you are trying to hurt someone else…so you totally deserve it. — Steph (@steph93065) October 5, 2019

Will Bill consider that he may be the hellscape? — kerry ⭐⭐⭐ 🇺🇸 (@K1erry) October 5, 2019

Appears you have a continuous need for that overwhelming feeling of great disappointment. — Deborah Wotton (@Mydesigningmind) October 5, 2019

lol! Like you, Romney is also a loser — Obi_1_D_AllKnowing 🇺🇸 (@obiopiah) October 5, 2019

Only losers respect other losers, Bill. This is why we dumped the whole lot of you for a winner. — Steph (@steph93065) October 5, 2019

How's that twitter poll working out for you, Bill. This puts you into the same category as Rosie. You two make a great couple. — Lonely Libertarian (@FrankLasCPA) October 5, 2019

Get a life loser and get off twitter fool. — CC (@ChatByCC) October 5, 2019

Is Bill Kristol relevant? — Caleb SkHull 💀🎃👻 (@CalebJHull) October 5, 2019

There was a time when I respected you. That time has passed. — KnoxvegasMike (@mlittle101) October 5, 2019

Have you see the pic of Mitt begging Trump to be Secretary of State? He doesn’t even respect himself. 😂😂😂 — Robby Starbuck (@robbystarbuck) October 5, 2019

Another leftist “poll” by the fakest Republican to announce their political party affiliation. If Billy was ever a “Republican” then I’ve always been a Democrat. Get a life, Billy. The only people against President Trump are those who can’t bear all this winning! But I regress. — S.L. Stiles (@StacyLStiles) October 5, 2019

I don’t know you are, but you seem to be really bad at polling. — TangoRomeo (@TangoRomeo20) October 5, 2019

Trump might be a crass loud mouth but at least he has a spine. Mitt on the other hand is civil but is a complete push over. — Skyler (@evo4g63t) October 5, 2019

it’s 2019 and you still haven’t figured out that twitter polls will always backfire on you — Caleb SkHull 💀🎃👻 (@CalebJHull) October 5, 2019

It's 2019 and he still hasn't figured out that @SenatorRomney has been rejected by the @GOP base. — MrLarsonTD (@larson_td) October 5, 2019

“Twitter is a hellscape precisely to the extent people don’t agree with me.” That how it works? — Jhon Simth (@JhonSimth) October 5, 2019

And to the extent that #MAGA hurts my feelings by hi-jacking my polls 😂😂😂😂 — I'm supposed to be whistle-blowing right now… (@hereforthejava) October 5, 2019

Romney is a good man but he is weak. He does not have the stamina to take what democrats constantly dish out. Romney surrenders into their madness. @POTUS takes them to task when he knows he is right, he stands up for it. — judy lynn (@KaiKelDav) October 5, 2019

I eagerly supported Romney in '12. Saw he was right about Russia, had successful business background I thought would work well as president. If any other GOP candidate had done what Trump is doing, he'd be a strong supporter. But he's let his personal dislike of DJT kill that. — Death's Guinea Pig 4.0 (@Bernie_Gilbert) October 5, 2019

The poll still has 17 hours to go, and the Romney fans are already declaring that “bots” have taken over the voting. If we remember we’ll check back in when this thing is over and see how well Kristol’s boy did.

Related:
description: Bill Kristol seems to enjoy posting Twitter polls in which he's humiliated.
